item.title: Internet angry at Allu Arjun's 'celebration' after prison release as boy injured in Pushpa 2 stampede remains critical - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Internet angry at Allu Arjun's 'celebration' after prison release as boy injured in Pushpa 2 stampede remains critical

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 09:44 AM IST

Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun's celebratory return home from prison following a high-profile arrest has sparked outrage online, particularly as a young victim from the associated stampede remains in critical condition.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested concerning a fan's death during the premiere of his film Pushpa 2: The Rule.
  • After his release, he was celebrated at home with significant industry support, which many deemed inappropriate given the ongoing tragedy.
  • Many social media users criticized the celebrations, calling it a PR stunt and questioning the lack of support for the deceased's family by Arjun.
  • The incident occurred during a large crowd gathering at Sandhya Theatre, leading to a stampede that resulted in significant casualties.
"Today's non-stop celebrity visits and the publicity around it has tilted the scales in favour of Revanth Reddy... It should have been a day of introspection, not celebration."

The critic response reflects a broader sentiment that celebrity culture can overshadow genuine human tragedy, urging a consideration of the consequences of such public displays amidst personal loss.

item.title: Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Allu Arjun, who was jailed following an incident at a film premiere, spent a normal night in prison and had rice and vegetable curry for dinner, according to an official from Telangana's prisons department.

  • Allu Arjun spent a night in Chanchalguda Central Prison after being arrested in the 'Pushpa 2' stampede case.
  • The actor was granted a four-week interim bail on the day of his arrest but was not released until the following morning.
  • During his time in jail, he did not request any special privileges and was treated as a special prisoner as per court order.
  • The delay in his release was due to procedural issues, as inmates are not typically released after 7 PM.
  • The incident at the movie premiere resulted in the death of a woman, leading to charges against Arjun and his security team.
“He was quite normal and did not appear depressed. Normally, the dinner time is 5:30 pm. However, late admissions are also served food. He had rice and vegetable curry.”

The situation highlights the challenges faced during high-profile releases and the implications of crowd management at events.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 10: The film sees huge growth of 71 percent on Saturday, post Allu A - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 10: The film sees huge growth of 71 percent on Saturday, post Allu Arjun's arrest; crosses Rs 820 crore

Publication Date: [Insert Date] Source: [Insert Source]

Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' has been breaking box office records, achieving a remarkable 71 percent growth in collections on its tenth day, despite the recent arrest of its star.

  • The film grossed Rs 62.3 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Of the total, Rs 46 crore came from the Hindi version and Rs 13 crore from the Telugu version.
  • The total box office collection now stands at Rs 824 crore in India across all languages.
  • The Hindi version of the film has so far collected Rs 498 crore, surpassing its Telugu counterpart.
  • The film has outperformed previous hits like 'Jawan' and 'RRR' in terms of total collection.
"This kind of growth is just unprecedented."

The success of 'Pushpa 2' continues to defy expectations, with further growth anticipated as the film remains in the spotlight following its controversies and increasing ticket sales.

item.title: Shashi Kapoor, Shammi Kapoor Loved Raj Kapoor 'Like A Father Figure': 'He Was A Complete Family Man' - News18
item.description:
Shashi Kapoor, Shammi Kapoor Loved Raj Kapoor 'Like A Father Figure': 'He Was A Complete Family Man'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: News18

As the Kapoor family honors Raj Kapoor’s legacy on his 100th birth anniversary, Aditya Raj Kapoor shares insights about the deep familial bond they shared.

  • Aditya Raj Kapoor is the son of Shammi Kapoor, Raj Kapoor’s brother.
  • Raj Kapoor was described as a complete family man who prioritized family gatherings.
  • Shashi and Shammi Kapoor regarded Raj Kapoor as a father figure.
  • Aditya praised Raj Kapoor's storytelling ability and his unique approach to filmmaking.
  • The Raj Kapoor Film Festival is currently showcasing his most celebrated films in Mumbai.
“Raj Saab started with a thought... he believed in his thoughts and the guts of his determination.” - Aditya Raj Kapoor

The Kapoor family continues to celebrate and remember Raj Kapoor’s profound impact on cinema as they showcase his iconic films during the festival.

item.title: Dilip Kumar Stood Beside Raj Kapoor, Asked Him To 'Wake Up' After He Suffered Cardiac Arrest: 'Acting Mat K - News18
item.description:
Dilip Kumar Stood Beside Raj Kapoor, Asked Him To 'Wake Up' After He Suffered Cardiac Arrest: 'Acting Mat Kar'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024, 21:02 IST

Source: News18

Veteran actress Saira Banu commemorated Raj Kapoor on his centenary, sharing touching memories of his friendship with Dilip Kumar, especially during challenging times.

  • Saira Banu shared a video on Instagram recalling the bond between Raj Kapoor and Dilip Kumar.
  • The video included light-hearted moments of the two actors, such as playing cricket and joking around.
  • Banu emphasized that despite perceptions of rivalry, they were childhood friends from Peshawar.
  • She recounted a poignant moment when Dilip Kumar rushed to Raj Kapoor's side after his cardiac arrest, expressing deep emotions.
  • Dilip Kumar whispered to Raj Kapoor, urging him to wake up and reminiscing about their joyous times together.
“Raj, wake up! I’ve brought the ‘khushboo’ of Chapli Kebabs. Let’s walk through the bazaar, like we used to eating kebabs, laughing, and reminiscing. Bas ab acting mat kar; take me back to Peshawar.” – Dilip Kumar

This heartfelt tribute from Saira Banu highlights the enduring friendship and affection between two legends of Indian cinema, reminding fans of the depth of human connections beyond fame.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Pisces, December 15 to 21, 2024 advices avoiding these expenses - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope Pisces, December 15 to 21, 2024 advises avoiding these expenses

Date: December 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

This week's horoscope for Pisces emphasizes emotional clarity, career opportunities, and the importance of financial prudence while focusing on personal growth.

  • Pisces will experience emotional growth and new love connections while prioritizing health.
  • Career opportunities may arise that require quick decision-making and proactive networking.
  • Financial caution is advised; avoid impulsive spending and consider future financial goals.
  • Balanced mental and physical health is essential, highlighting exercise and diet.
"Take a look at your budget and make sure you are spending in line with your long-term goals." - Dr. J. N. Pandey

In conclusion, this week encourages Pisces to navigate their emotional landscape with wisdom while remaining vigilant in career and financial matters for a balanced and fulfilling life.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Aquarius, December 15 to 21, 2024 predicts personal growth - Hindustan Times
item.description:

Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This week, Aquarians can expect new opportunities, introspection, and personal growth. It's a time to be open-minded and adaptable to change.

  • Embrace new opportunities and be flexible in challenges.
  • Strengthen emotional connections in love, be open to honest conversations.
  • Innovative ideas will be valued in the workplace; don't hesitate to share.
  • Financially, focus on long-term goals and avoid impulsive spending.
  • Maintain a balanced health routine and prioritize mental well-being.
"Be open minded and flexible to tackle challenges, and build connections for personal and professional success."

In conclusion, this week presents a promising opportunity for Aquarians to grow both personally and professionally, emphasizing the importance of connections and balanced health.

item.title: Ram Charan’s performance as Appanna in Game Changer will shock everyone – Srikanth - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan’s performance as Appanna in Game Changer will shock everyone – Srikanth

Published on: Dec 15, 2024, 2:59 am IST

Ram Charan's upcoming dual role in the political drama Game Changer, directed by Shankar, is generating significant buzz, particularly regarding his performance as Appanna, which is expected to surprise audiences.

  • Ram Charan plays dual roles: a father (farmer Konidela Appanna) and son (IAS officer Konidela Ram Nandan).
  • The film is set for release on January 10, 2025, during the Sankranthi festival.
  • Srikanth, a senior character actor in the film, claims Charan's performance will shock viewers.
  • Kiara Advani, SJ Suryah, Anjali, and others are part of the cast alongside Ram Charan.
  • The music for the film is composed by Thaman, produced by Dil Raju.
“Charan’s characters in Game Changer will look quite different and refreshing.” – Srikanth

The anticipation for Game Changer builds as Ram Charan takes on these diverse roles, and fans are eager to see his unique portrayal of Appanna.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10 (Early Trends): Enters 500 Crore Club Defying All Norms With A Massive 70% Jump! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10 (Early Trends): Enters 500 Crore Club Defying All Norms With A Massive 70% Jump

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 has achieved remarkable box office success, entering the 500 crore club in just 10 days, demonstrating a significant increase in earnings.

  • The film’s total earnings after 10 days are estimated at 509 crore.
  • On Day 10, it earned an estimated 46 to 48 crore, marking a 70% increase from the previous day's earnings of 27 crore.
  • The film had an impressive opening with 72 crore and achieved a total of 291 crore over an extended 4-day weekend.
  • In its first week, the box office collection reached 434.50 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 is now the sixth highest-grossing Hindi film, surpassing KGF: Chapter 2.

"It was expected that the film would enter the 500 crore club on Sunday, but it defied all expectations..."

Pushpa 2's box office performance defies expectations and has set new benchmarks in the Hindi film industry, showcasing its widespread popularity and commercial success.

item.title: Samanta Calls Naga Chaitanya, Sobhita Dhulipala ‘Most Dignified Couple’; Drops UNSEEN Pics From Their Weddi - News18
item.description:
Samanta Calls Naga Chaitanya, Sobhita Dhulipala ‘Most Dignified Couple’; Drops UNSEEN Pics From Their Wedding

Publication Date: December 14, 2024, 19:01 IST

Source: News18

Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya recently tied the knot in a traditional ceremony, and Samanta Dhulipala has shared unseen photos from their wedding, expressing her emotions and admiration for the couple.

  • The wedding took place on December 4 at Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad.
  • Samanta shared heartfelt messages alongside newly released images from the wedding celebration.
  • She described the wedding as an emotional moment, praising her sister and Naga Chaitanya as the most dignified couple she knows.
  • The photos include Sobhita looking stunning in traditional attire and enjoying pre-wedding festivities.
  • The couple made their first public outing after marriage at Srisailam Temple.
“This was such an emotional moment for me.. love you so much Akka Only I know how you love and how much you do for the people in your life. To the most dignified couple I know Akka and Chay." - Samanta Dhulipala

The wedding of Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya has not only brought joy to their families but has also captured the hearts of fans, who are eagerly sharing and celebrating the couple's special moments.

item.title: Will Game Changer have a sequel? Senior hero clarifies - 123telugu
item.description:
Will Game Changer have a sequel? Senior hero clarifies

Published on: Dec 15, 2024 1:03 am IST

Game Changer, a major upcoming film, has sparked discussions about a potential sequel, which has been clarified by a senior actor.

  • The film is directed by Shankar and stars Ram Charan, set for release on January 10, 2025.
  • Srikanth, a senior character actor, confirmed in an interview that Game Changer is a standalone movie with no sequel planned.
  • The film features an ensemble cast including Kiara Advani, SJ Suryah, Anjali, and others.
  • Game Changer is notable for being a standalone film amid a trend of sequels in the Indian film industry.
“In these times of sequels, a standalone movie featuring some of the top stars of Indian cinema is a refreshing change.”

The clarification about Game Changer being a standalone film highlights its unique position in a market overflowing with sequels, creating anticipation for its release.

item.title: Dilli ka Dil luteya! When Brown Munde, AP Dhillon, Honey Singh and Jazzy B came together for an unforgettable night - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dilli ka Dil luteya! When Brown Munde, AP Dhillon, Honey Singh and Jazzy B came together for an unforgettable night

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Indo-Canadian rapper and singer AP Dhillon made an unforgettable debut in the Capital on Saturday night at the Indira Gandhi Stadium, which turned into a musical carnival with surprise performances by Punjabi music icons Jazzy B and Yo! Yo! Honey Singh.

  • Jazzy B performed his classic Dil Luteya and Honey Singh brought his hit Millionaire.
  • AP Dhillon opened the show with signature hits like Excuses and Brown Munde.
  • Dhillon performed tracks from his latest EP, including Bora Bora and Old Money.
  • The concert atmosphere was electric, with Dhillon engaging the crowd and urging them to make some noise.
  • The event celebrated Dhillon's journey as a global Punjabi artist and his impact on modern Punjabi pop music.
“Delhi, are you having fun? Make some noise!”

As the night ended on a euphoric note, Delhi was left buzzing, showcasing AP Dhillon’s ability to blend tradition with modernity and create unforgettable moments for his fans.

item.title: Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun arrest: Telangana congress president says law will take its course

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

B Mahesh Kumar Goud, the Congress president in Telangana, commented on the arrest of popular Telugu actor Allu Arjun, stating that the legal process is being followed, and expressed that the party holds no ill will against film actors.

  • Goud stated that the cases against Arjun are legal and he has been granted bail.
  • He emphasized Congress's supportive stance towards cinema heroes, citing historical support for the Telugu film industry.
  • The arrest of Allu Arjun arose from an incident during the premiere of his film 'Pushpa 2' where a fan jostling led to a woman's death.
  • Goud criticized BJP leaders for politicizing the situation regarding the arrest.
  • He mentioned the need for lawful action against BRS leader K T Rama Rao if irregularities are found in connection to a past race event in Hyderabad.
"The cases filed against Arjun are within the purview of law and the court granted him bail," said Goud.

This incident highlights the intersection of celebrity culture and legal affairs, as political leaders navigate public sentiment and legal processes simultaneously.

item.title: Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda' - News18
item.description:
Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: News18

Veteran actor Mohan Babu has clarified that his anticipatory bail petition has not been rejected, countering false reports circulating in media.

  • Mohan Babu clarified via social media that his anticipatory bail has not been rejected.
  • He stated he is currently under medical care and requested accurate reporting from the media.
  • The statement follows reports claiming a rejection by the Telangana High Court regarding his bail plea related to an attack on a journalist.
  • Mohan Babu apologized for the incident, which he described as “unfortunate,” asserting he acted in self-defense against anti-social elements.
  • He expressed regret for the injury sustained by the journalist in the incident he described.
“False propaganda is being circulated! Anticipatory bail has NOT been rejected and currently, I am under medical care in my home. I request the media to get the facts right."

The actor's statement aims to clear misconceptions regarding his legal situation, emphasizing the need for factual reporting amid ongoing legal challenges.

item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Allu Arjun film shatter records on Saturday, Eyes 200cr second weekend in India

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Second Saturday has significantly boosted Pushpa 2's position in its quest to break lifetime records, particularly that of Baahubali 2.

  • Pushpa 2 is projected to gross over Rs. 70 crore on its Second Saturday, surpassing Baahubali 2's record of Rs. 64.25 crore.
  • The film is now on track to achieve the highest second weekend collection ever, potentially earning around Rs. 200 crore.
  • Early estimates indicate an 80% growth in collections for the Hindi version compared to previous days.
  • Pushpa 2 has passed the Rs. 900 crore milestone, with a total gross of approximately Rs. 925 crore and aiming for Rs. 1000 crore soon.
"The trajectory is highly encouraging," indicating Pushpa 2's competitive race with Baahubali 2.

As Pushpa 2 continues to break records, it sets a promising pace for future milestones in the Indian box office landscape.

item.title: Srikanth Gives Leaks About 'Game Changer'.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Srikanth Gives Leaks About 'Game Changer'

Date & Source: Unknown Date, GreatAndhra

Introduction: Srikanth, who plays a key role in the upcoming film 'Game Changer', has shared some insights about the movie, generating excitement among fans.

  • Srikanth assures that 'Game Changer' will exceed all expectations with unexpected twists and turns.
  • The film is said to balance strong narratives with powerful elevations, making it appealing to audiences.
  • Srikanth clarifies that there will be no sequel to 'Game Changer' and attributes shooting delays to scheduling challenges with the star-studded cast.
  • The movie is set to release on January 10 as a Sankranthi treat, with Ram Charan's role as Appanna being a major highlight.
"Audiences today love stories that combine strong narratives with powerful elevations. While some films focus solely on elevations, this one perfectly balances both. Shankar’s recent films may not have been successful, but this will not disappoint," Srikanth said.

Conclusion: 'Game Changer' is anticipated to be a thrilling and well-balanced film, with Srikanth's leaks adding to the hype surrounding its release.

item.title: Sushmita Sen’s Ex-BF Rohman Shawl Reveals Her Heart Attack Left Him ‘Numb’; ‘It Makes You Also Introspect’ - News18
item.description:
Sushmita Sen’s Ex-BF Rohman Shawl Reveals Her Heart Attack Left Him ‘Numb’; ‘It Makes You Also Introspect’

Publication Date: December 15, 2024, 02:46 IST

Source: News18

Sushmita Sen's ex-boyfriend Rohman Shawl discusses the emotional impact of her heart attack last year, reflecting on the introspection it prompted in his own life.

  • Sushmita Sen suffered a massive heart attack last year but has since recovered.
  • Rohman Shawl revealed that the incident left him feeling numb and introspective about health.
  • Despite the gravity of the situation, Sushmita maintained a positive outlook, which surprised him.
  • Rohman has started prioritizing his health and gets regular checkups following this experience.
  • Sushmita had 95% blockage in her main artery and successfully underwent angioplasty.
“When something like that happens, the first thing is you’re just numb because you don’t know what just hit you." - Rohman Shawl

The heart attack Sushmita Sen experienced not only changed her outlook on health but also profoundly influenced Rohman Shawl's perspective on life and relationships.
